pros: Your supervisors are good people and care about both your success and comfort on the job. It can be rewarding to help others succeed. For those people who really use and appreciate your help, it is actually a great way to make friends and connections.
cons: Sometimes people show up for tutoring only because they want extra credit or because they have to be there for some class. It's hard to help someone who doesn't really want to learn, so this can make the job stressful and annoying at times.

pros: Great flexibility and freedom to design the Courses I taught!
cons: Limited amount of Courses that I could teach ~ limited my income.

pros: standard college interview, but meet with very friendly people. great campus tour experiences and great view
cons: not any cons there. everything is satisfied.
